entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning late this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast. Wind becoming light overnight. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries ending overnight then partly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 05 February 2023
